Writer: Jez Butterworth (screenplay), Tom Butterworth (screenplay), Carlo Carlei (story), Peter Rader (story), Valerio Manfredi (story)
Title: The Last Legion
Actors: Colin Firth, Ben Kingsley, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Peter Mullan
Plot: As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.
